website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, yet designed to stick as long as you need it. It's easy to fall in love with your favorite colors of Rouge Signature.
pros: Wide variety of bold and everyday hues available
cons: Takes a little longer to dry than expected

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!! It does go on like water, but smoother. I hate being able to feel my makeup in my face, it distracts me so this was a great option for me. I found the applicator shape super helpful and easy to use. Loved the pigmentation and the wear, very natural, doesn’t look weird as it wears off. Some mattes I’ve tried wore off in patches or got clumpy on my lips as I drank stuff, not this one!! First pic is wear half way through the day, after eating and drinking with no touch up. Second pic is end of day, still no touch ups! I’m so pleased that I promptly ordered 3 other colors❤️
customer_reviews.author: Karina Boots

customer_reviews.title: Unquestionably the best lip stain EVER
customer_reviews.text: Most amazing lip ink I have ever used. The colors are just stunning. It stays on ALL DAY and the applicator is crazy wonderful!!!! I love it so much I bought three colors. The rose color is for every day and the deep ruby red is special occasions. Just fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Karen's Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Nothing pigmented or matte about this RIPOFF
customer_reviews.text: $9.99???? More like .99 cents! Worse than the dollar lipstick at dollar tree. There is nothing pigmented it matte about this lipstick . The worse I have purchased from drugstore brands. You are better off paying half the price for revlon, wet n wild, NYX brands.
customer_reviews.author: Lion

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye to my $11.99, RIP
customer_reviews.text: This product has a pronounced cooling sensation as soon as it hits your lips, feeling like you're putting something on there that shouldn't be used on the skin. It's a thin liquid and doesn't set right away, although the pigmentation is bright. I just can't get over the bizarre, chemical sensation on my lips and have to toss this. I have had similarly unpleasant experiences with L'Oreal's Pro Matte Lip Gloss and Maybelline's Vivid Matte Liquid, which both caused a weird numbing sensation. The only drugstore liquid lip formulas that so far get my seal of approval are by NYX and Wet'n'Wild, because they don't feel cooling or numbing when you put them on.
customer_reviews.author: sapphire daisy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic liquid lipstick!
customer_reviews.text: Love the everything about this product. Great color and formula of a satin matte with moisture is perfect for liquid lipstick. It is long wearing, not fully transfer proof yet color stays on lips, and reapplying color doesn't add any issues. I would definitely would recommend to others and will continue purchase again along with other colors.
customer_reviews.author: josephine ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Not at all like I expected
customer_reviews.text: This does not go on red at all it's more pink than anything else. It was a total dud and I can't even get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It is just fabulous!! I like how it's not cakey and not flakey! I used two layers on my lips to get it a bit darker and waited for the first layer to dry and then added more!! It lasted all through my 4 hour class! I had coffee and water!! One layer is awesome still I just wanted it a bit more dramatic for today so the second layer was added and it still felt light!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: This matte lip stain is amazing :)
customer_reviews.text: I like how the color stays on your lips all day. I may have to reapply once during the day at work, but that’s it. It definitely has a matte look once applied and dried. Please note if you want something that doesn’t leave lip stains on coffee cups etc. this product isn’t for you. If you don’t mind it like me then I totally recommend you get this product. Main reason why I got this is because it doesn’t have beeswax in the ingredients which I am sensitive to. Photos represent two different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Aliza

customer_reviews.title: What a bummer!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lip stain because I like to wear a red lipstick once in a while. This color of red actually is a high color of orange instead of a red color. Very, very disappointed. I find that buying a lip stain or lip stick is better if bought in a store because I hate sending things back it's rather time consuming!!
customer_reviews.author: reynald

customer_reviews.title: It will amaze you!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it might look cheap or something but it is not!!! My friend recommended me this, I choose the color“I explore” which amazes me. The outshape is like a chubby pen, and not very lightweight. It looks fantastic and quite durable on the lip. Definitely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Yvie

customer_reviews.title: Does not last at all.
customer_reviews.text: All day wear?? Big NOPE. Comes right off. The best all day matte I've found surprisingly was your 12 for $12.99 pack of lipsticks by Northshow. No funny coloring, no transfers. Best ever. Sorry i wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Allison McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, nice formula, good price
customer_reviews.text: Review from my 20 year old daughter: The shade I Amaze is very pretty and unique, a peachy terra cotta. For a matte lip color it is lightweight and non drying. It isn’t really a stain, but is more of a lightweight, slightly sheer liquid matte lipstick. It isn’t completely transfer proof. The packaging is very nice and the price is good, especially if you can catch a sale.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is everything the advertisement says it is.
customer_reviews.text: Hello... I usually don't do reviews, but I had too on this lip stain. First of all it is GREAT!.. It feels good on the lips.. I love the matte lip sticks...matte lip pencils, I have many of both and I hate them all. Most are heavy, just plain irritating, can't wait to wipe it off. Got my order I rebel 30 minutes ago while eating dinner..mail lady was late...left the table, washed of Italian salad dressing, applied the Loreal lip stain, and oh my God...it is everything it claimed in the advertisement... smooth and light as a feather.. Run, don't walk to get this ladies... I will be...worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: liquee

customer_reviews.title: It IS Long Lasting and NOT Drying
customer_reviews.text: NOT Drying to your lips like some other long lasting lip color lip stains that will leave your lips as though they're stuck together - not good. This is geat. This is not drying on your lips and nothing gets stuck anywhere :) Just make sure you let it dry completely before you start using your lips - LOL :-) It also is clean in that it leaves no lip mark once it is dry. Stay pretty, keep your colors on ladies ... :-)
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Deserves a MILLION STARS!! ♥
customer_reviews.text: This "Handsdown" is the BEST lipstick I have ever used period!!!!! I have been using the same tube for months!!!! No need to even use a lipliner! It has a beautiful flat pointed brush for each precision application. I loved it SO much I purchased a couple more - one for my purse and one for my work area. That way I am never without it. I have tried them all, believe me. Wearing lipstick is my vane habit. I am a mature woman, and as mentioned, tried them all. EVEN THE SUPER EXPENSIVE ONES AND NOTHING COMPARES!!! THIS IS AN AMAZING PRODUCT!!! If you are debating which one to select, do not think about it anymore!! BUY IT!!! (ノ◕ヮ◕)ノ*:・゚✧
customer_reviews.author: Billio

customer_reviews.title: Velvety, deep pigment
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The color and finish is stellar on this lip stain. It is very noticeable (no subtlety here) and lasts pretty much all day. As it fades it does so evenly, leaving a pink stain that doesn’t look bad. When freshly applied it is very flashy, great for a date night or a job where you need to be noticed. I have other lip stains from more expensive brands, and I think this one is as good.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color. Lightweight. Easy to transfer
customer_reviews.text: I bought the I amaze color. It is like a dark terracotta or burnt orange brown. The color is so gorgeous! It is pigmented but at the same time, slightly sheer, which I love. I hate lipstick that is too opaque and weigh my lips down or too drying. This liquid lip is perfect for daily wear. However it never completely dry. It leaves stain everywhere my lip touches, cup, straw, water bottle etc. I wish they made the liquid dry down to a non transfer formula.
customer_reviews.author: Tri Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful maple color
customer_reviews.text: Matte maple color, very beautiful, lightweight feeling. Color can last 4 hours if you do not drink or eat often. Good for fall or winter use. Not too much moisture, I think this due to matte look, I loved it. Amazon customer service is really good. The first one was broken when I received it, I reported to amazon customer service via online chat, they immediately shipped a replacement one to me.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: didnt last even 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: It goes on super smooth, stays wet for a while, once it dries it doesn't kiss off but after drinking water i was expecting it to still be on, came off with one meal didn't have any sign of it on my lips. love the cool. a little disappointed i didn't have makeup set for the next morning like most lip stains stay on forever. I guess they are good if you want to change colors everyday. don't really need anything to get off. ill probably try another color and i will still wear this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but very short wear life
customer_reviews.text: The color is very nice but it does not act like a stain, it is lipstick. I'm lucky if I am able to make it last for 3 hours. I was wanting an actual stain that would outlast my 8 hour work shift. This product is not it. If you're just looking for a nice color that needs to be reapplied, this is good. If you're looking for one that is apologize once and forgotten, this is not want you want.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brantley

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on any longer then regular lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a good stay on lipstick that actually lasts, and feels good, not awful and dry... this product did go on easy with the wand. But it didn’t last at all, maybe 15 minutes. Just like regular lipstick. Color is pretty to. It also feels good that was kinda a feeling that it wouldn’t last..didn’t need chapstick etc like the reviews say. Maybe I got a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Save your money.
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely not a lip stain. Competing with other products in this category, this falls short in so many ways. It’s more of an attempt at long lasting gloss, without being glossy. It’s pretty thick, for a “stain” and seems to stain everything but your lips throughout the day, if you don’t eat or drink anything, MAYBE it will stay on throughout the day. Maybe.
customer_reviews.author: KK28

customer_reviews.title: Best. Lip. Stain. Ever
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 'I Don't' which is a beautiful red/orange color, to compare it with my almost $40 YSL 'Water Stain Lip Stain #618'--which smells lovely and the color is on point but I find myself having to reapply after each drink and several times a day-- doesn't stain at all. I applied L'oreal's, sipped on hot beverages and by the end of the day I still had a red/orange tint to my lips--hence what a good lip 'stain' is supposed to do, not a $40 ripoff. So glad I tried this. Purchasing more colors!
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I will agree that it is lightweight and comfortable to wear and that its a stain. It is not "lasting" and not matte as normally expected in liquid matte lipsticks. It will need to be reapplied a few times throughout the day for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ann-MarieTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Good lip stain!
customer_reviews.text: I like this lip stain. It feels good on my lips and last an okay amount of time. I would not say it's a stain, but more of a matte gloss. The color I do not prefer, but no fault of the companies. I selected a color that looked good in picture, but does not flatter me. I would buy again, just in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Teague

customer_reviews.title: LOVE 💋
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. Beautiful colors! I ordered a second color already. I only need one application, but if you want it darker just apply, let dry, and add another application. Dries fast & is long lasting. Smells good too 💋
customer_reviews.author: Letitia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I hate this product! It goes on very “wet” and the color is almost transparent! The color was faded within 3 hours of having it on, and I didn’t even eat or drink anything! The shade of color was very pretty and natural, it just didn’t hold up to other brands such as Maybeline or Cover Girl!
customer_reviews.author: twin mom

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Ling-Lasting Color
customer_reviews.text: I have these L’Oreal lip stains in several shades. They’re lovely! They go on smoothly and provide long lasting gorgeous color. I Radiate is a new favorite- it’s the perfect bright coral with just enough peachy-pink to make this a truly eye-catching shade.
customer_reviews.author: B. R. Grande

customer_reviews.title: It’s not worth the money don’t believe the hype
customer_reviews.text: This is a busy For me the product is very thin and liquidy you have to put on at least 10 coats to even get your lips coated and then it doesn’t last pass one meal you have to be as careful with it as you do with any lipstick it doesn’t give you any freedom at all
customer_reviews.author: pastor694

customer_reviews.title: Attractive
customer_reviews.text: Hard to pick out shades, the pics are never true to actual color. Also seems to wear off much quicker than expected. I have to dab my lips and smear with finger to keep it from getting too dark. I'd say it's "OK", but I won't buy anymore once they are all used up. You don't know until you try, Some people love it, so it's a matter of taste. ~ Tracey
customer_reviews.author: Ken McCall

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken. Cannot Last Through Eating or Drinking
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful color as expected. However it is already broken when arrived. I have to glue the pieces together. Cannot last through eating or drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Lady J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Such an amazing line!
customer_reviews.text: So if I were to read this review from someone else's view there probably thinking what is she on lol. I have never had a weightless lipstick ever. It's like wearing water. Idk how else to describe it. Almost like nothing is there. And it doesn't dry up your lips which to me is a major plus. I love this formula. And I love the color super vibrant and bright. Love love love!!
customer_reviews.author: lilian gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Won't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Too leaquidy,not visible at all, desappears within minutes..is defenetely not mate
customer_reviews.author: Niki & Caro

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color and great texture
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe I can get such a great lip stain at such a low price. A perfect color for the winter, although it is not those kind of long-lasting lip stick, but already amazing in many aspects. Totally into the color and the texture, really recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Ma

customer_reviews.title: Love the shade
customer_reviews.text: I have looked for a very long time trying to find this color. All I wear for lipstick is L’Oreal. It’s not particularly a stain compared to my other stains as once I eat, it’s gone. Still love it and will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: L. Entsminger

customer_reviews.title: I really wish it lasted longer
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I brought the shade titled I Enjoy. It is a great pink/red. It goes on really bright at first and then once it dries, it adjusts to your skin color and looks flawless. My only complaint is that it doesnt last very long. One bottle of water and a cup of coffee later and it is almost gone :(
customer_reviews.author: BKG2016

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, doesn't fade or rub off!
customer_reviews.text: I am new to wearing lipstick regularly and I needed something that didn't need constant reapplication. I love this color, and the consistency of the lipstick is nice but not too sticky or thick. I do not find it to be moisturizing, though, and I add chapstick on top of it. After many hours of use, it is still on there and hasn't faded.
customer_reviews.author: Erin M. Icenhour

customer_reviews.title: The best long lasting lipstick I ever had
customer_reviews.text: Omg I've used lots of lipsticks that claim to have that matte look without the thick dry feeling and long lasting but still be dry and wipe off especially when eating or drinking this lipstick was different I didnt have to jse lip gloss with it,its moisturizing rich color and last long even after eating and drinking it didnt fade nor smudge the color is so pretty will be buying again and again
customer_reviews.author: Glamouris

customer_reviews.title: VERY BITTER TASTE, SPLOTCHY, STRANGE APPLICATOR
customer_reviews.text: Color goes on kind of splotchy and uneven. The taste is extremely bitter, so much so that I have to put Chap Stick over it so I can't taste it. I don't know how long it lasts as I have only had it on a few minutes before washing my face. The applicator is awkward which adds to the splotchyness.
customer_reviews.author: Dawna Kern

customer_reviews.title: Nice hue but rubs off easily and doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I get lots of compliments on the color of this but it doesn't last very long and certainly isn't very moisturizing (not that I would expect a lip stain to be). It rubs off with a tissue and actually dries out my lips a little. Not sure that I'd buy this product again - unless it was solely for the color.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Saw Tati Westbrook try this on in one of her videos. It looked much pinker/fushia in the video. It looked pretty red on me, which I don't like. It is very pigmented. Maybe if I use a little, I can make it work. I am not as pale as Tati, was hoping it would be lighter on me than her.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: easy application
customer_reviews.text: The brush is AMAZING, providing such easy application. The color is highly pigmented but what I was looking for. I ordered "I Captivate" and would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Black Beauty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nude for me
customer_reviews.text: It's always a struggle to find a nice nude. They either tend to be too pink or too brown and just in general too pale of either. I feel like Goldilocks ... this is JUST right.
customer_reviews.author: Aly Herring

customer_reviews.title: Good wand, not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and the wand. It goes on smooth but doesn’t last more than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: OKAYHOLLYWOOD

customer_reviews.title: It was a pleasing color and didn't leave an impression of the color on glasses/cups
customer_reviews.text: It stayed put but left quickly when drinking/eating quickly. It didn't leave impression of the lipstick on cups/glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Thought
customer_reviews.text: I saw this lipstick on Tiktok and it looked really nice when they applied it so I bought one here because it's cheaper. I never bought cosmetic products on Amazon before, but I'm not disappointed. This lipstick came in the package perfectly and it wasn't broken. The color was really nice and I used the Korean style to put the lipstick on. It doesn't last that long but it looks really nice for cute photos and daily use. I definitely suggest you guys to buy one from Amazon and try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and flattering
customer_reviews.text: I am not usually a fan of lipstick, but I find this one pleasant. It is light to wear, lighter than chapstick for example. The color is flattering (I am fair skinned with some freckles). The application tip is well designed, it looks like a pointy leaf, which allows for precise application. It goes on wet, and then dries quickly. It doesn't rub off too much or leave a ring on my glass. It isn't quite a lip stain though, I need to reapply after eating. Overall I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle1650

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lipstick and I own A LOT of lipstick lol. It lasts and the color is absolutely perfect for me. Even if you don’t get this shade and you find your own perfect one there’s no way you can hate the longevity. I have MAC and Too Faced Smashbox etc. this one wins. I love my other ones but this is my go to and has been for years.
customer_reviews.author: ashton sinclair kenney

customer_reviews.title: lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This lipstick does not stay on I will not purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: nicole culmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice color!
customer_reviews.text: This lipstain is a good color and is good for keeping the color on your lips instead of transferring onto a mask!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took a bit of time to figure out.
customer_reviews.text: Not the perfect color for me but I did figure out how to use. Just need a small about of product and you need to let your lips dry completely, best to stand in front of fan. If not completely dry it tended to bleed off my lip line.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color!Like My lips wear nothing!Love it so much. Good value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Yalin

customer_reviews.title: My lips still felt so soft and moistened the next morning!!
customer_reviews.text: I think the color was a bit dark for me, but the Rouge went on so easily and it felt so soft and I could feel it moisturizing my lips as I put it on. I thought the color would last longer than just a couple of hours. My lips still felt so soft and moistened the next morning!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Baird

customer_reviews.title: A lip stain that actually works~!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great color, long lasting.... I usually have licked or bitten my lips causing my lipstick to require constant reapplying... this is a stain....love it~!!
customer_reviews.author: BuddhistBiker

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and put it on, WOW it glides on so smooth! It didn't glob up and just get on my teeth... it's also not super drying and I love the applicator (it's like a little cushion that perfectly disperses the color).
customer_reviews.author: MiKayla S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and waste of effort and funds.
customer_reviews.text: Wet after applied and took for ever to dry. Took three coats to have actual coverage. Smears when touched hours later and gone with the first touch. Such a waste of funds and not what was expected by this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Nice color but not long last
customer_reviews.text: I like the color. Just wish it would last longer. It dies come off rarely quickly. I have tried other L’Oréal long last products that actually last. Was not too happy that this one didn’t last very long.
customer_reviews.author: LoveMe

customer_reviews.title: Watery, thin, wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t last long. It’s very watery and thin and I have to apply a lot for it to look good. Bought the red one and it looks very red on the outside, but when I put it on it looks very pink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my lip game and it's so affordable!
customer_reviews.text: OMG I love love this product! I was hesitant because I'm a fan of IT cosmetics and I have my lip routine. This blew that up! Wow I love this color and it looks beautiful for hours!!!!!!!! Buying ALL the colors!
customer_reviews.author: Lalalindsey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the easy application and the coverage it provides, initially I was looking for the color that Beyoncé’s make up artist used on her but it was all sold out, glad I got this color it suits my skin tone better.
customer_reviews.author: ladydnyce

customer_reviews.title: Great application wand beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy, love the application wand for clean edges. Wears longer than most lip colors! It does come off when drinking beverages but even with that still lasts longer than most colors do!
customer_reviews.author: Christine A.

customer_reviews.title: Precise application, nice color, lasts.
customer_reviews.text: The application makes it easy to apply precisely. I put a first coat on, wait a few seconds then apply a second coat. The stain lasts a decent time, longer than others I've tried. I do plan on buying other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay on
customer_reviews.text: Color is great, but it doesn't stay on, would require to be reapplied several times per day or evening
customer_reviews.author: Kikky

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty on my dark brown african American skin. I was looking for a pink i can wear in the spring and on my softer days. This color is nice not too light and not too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma2014

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible! I was searching for a lipstick that would be smudge proof, would hate a smear of lipstick inside my face mask, and this delivered! It goes on easily and there was even pigment left on my lips after dinner at an Indian meal. It also doesn’t feel too dry, just feels like wearing no lipstick once it’s set.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Thurlow

customer_reviews.title: Orange matte lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I thought the color was gonna be more vibrant (Orange). Overall I liked it but it’s hard to figure out how to put it and let it dry so that the color stays and doesn’t fade away
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Cheeto lips
customer_reviews.text: I bought thebI avhieve shade. Not the same color as advertised in the dropdown. Looks like cheeto dust on lips wasted money for this.
customer_reviews.author: Anna San Luis

customer_reviews.title: Not great for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: I expected all day wear. Looks pretty and is easy to apply but unfortunately, it wore off quickly (usually by the time my coffee was gone). Wouldn’t recommend for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh.. "Stain" isn't an apt description.
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty when it goes on, but wear time is only about an hour before it starts to fade and then it fades quickly. I'd hoped for a more pigmented stain that could last the day with minimal reapplication.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom

customer_reviews.title: Too Faced Gingerbread Girl Dupe
customer_reviews.text: This color is full coverage. No streaking. All day wear even when eating greasy foods. It is a matter formula so it is drying definitely need to pre moisturise before applying. During the same time I purched it I also purchased the Too Faced Gingerbread girl this I would consider a great dupe same color.
customer_reviews.author: Brivera

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous color, amazing formula!
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this formula. It's very thin in consistency, but dries down so naturally that I don't even realize I'm wearing anything! The color is gorgeous and I LOVE LOVE LOVE the applicator. I've never seen or used an applicator like this before, but it applies the product effortlessly in one swipe. I will definitely be repurchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren M.

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I could have went darker...my complexion I have a hard time choosing if it's not dark enough. Anything lighter washes me out...makes me look old. But other wise...very nice product
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Omg, love this!!!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this lipstick was great. It made me feel so pretty, and stayed on all day without drying my lips out. It was wonderful and light. I will be buying more shades!
customer_reviews.author: Sneakypie

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in two different shades and I absolutely love them. Colors are beautiful and do not dry my lips like other matte lipsticks. Easy to take off as well.
customer_reviews.author: JUJU

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL FEELING
customer_reviews.text: Applies without a sticky residue and dries without a heavy cracking feeling. I have finally found my matte lipstick and I plan on buying more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: The longevity stinks
customer_reviews.text: I've tried this product in 3 or 4 different colors and I'm done. Not only does the longevity suck, it fades in the most unflattering ways. It looks horrible as the day goes on. Done, done, done.
customer_reviews.author: 1saintsgirl

customer_reviews.title: Transfers from lips to other things, not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT kiss proof. It got on my cups when I drank from them. It's the whole point of buying a lipstick like this. It's It's pretty, but it didn't do what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Intended

customer_reviews.title: Great quality- Amazing price.
customer_reviews.text: I got this originally for the color and for sure the price. I do not wear much make up ever but I felt like purchasing something for myself. This product applies very easy and smooth. The brush was a little different shaped them I am used to but that’s not much of a issue of at all. Really like it and can not wait to add to my look the next time I do decide to get dolled up. I love that I do not feel like I have clay on my lips . Feels so smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Kandy DeLeon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: From the minute I was applying it, I loved it!!! I love the applicator, I love how it doesn't feel dry and lasted through 2 meals, one being pizza! It really holds up well. I can't wait to try another color!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but no staying power
customer_reviews.text: It's very light and the color is nice. However, it has 0 durability. Had to reapply twice in the AM. It doesn't dry your lips out though. Was trying to see if this could be a dupe for NARS Powermatte lip stain but was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Selene A.

customer_reviews.title: Moist, not dry
customer_reviews.text: Goes on smoothly and not dry like some of their lip stains. Color is ok.
customer_reviews.author: MizGee

customer_reviews.title: Not a lip stain
customer_reviews.text: First off, this is not a lip stain. It does rub off regardless of how long you wait. But the color is exactly what I was looking for (I ordered “I Don’t” 422) and it’s a bright red. The applicator stick is amazing, and makes it super easy to apply. Those factors are why I gave it overall 4 stars, I took a star away because it’s not a lip stain like I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lipstick
customer_reviews.text: I wanted orange and I got it! Beautiful color a bit bright. But I use a lip pencil in neutral color to tone it down a bit. Looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Aida M.

customer_reviews.title: Good formula
customer_reviews.text: I like the formula of this lip stain. Doesn't feel like anything is on the lips. It's a bold color so I don't use it on an everyday basis but, I would try the other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: This lipstick comes off the first time you drink or eat.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lipstick because I thought it would last all day. The name is Lasting Matte Lip Stain. It doesn't stain your lips and does not last.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful color and last all day it can spread outside lip line. I have to use lip liner with this I am a mature woman though. I love the applicator and coverage that last all day and night
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this lipstick and the color! It feels moisturizing on my lips,it doesn’t get all streaky and gummy and it lasts forever. I was looking for a nude-ish color that didn’t make my lips look like ashy versions of themselves and this is it! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yuyu

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color, works for me
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color & how it goes on, however, it doesn’t stay on as long as others, but still like it & would buy again
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Booo
customer_reviews.text: Not the color as shown. It’s bright orange. I deserve a refund, but can’t send back): Do t trust their color chart. It’s BD
customer_reviews.author: Melusina

customer_reviews.title: very moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: very flattering, soft and easy to apply..the applicator is great...allows you to apply lipstick without over lining lips
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip stain! It's actually not too drying on my lips and the color lasts just about 8 hours, with eating a drinking in between. Love this color too! It's nice and subtle.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Balko

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Lip Stain!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lip stain! This color is a mauve shade and it stays put, doesn't bleed. I give it an A+.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Longwearing
customer_reviews.text: The color chart seemed handy and really neat to use, but the color was much darker than the picture suggested
customer_reviews.author: Kimber Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Returning it!
customer_reviews.text: I received this lip stain yesterday. It was not sealed and had been opened prior to shipping. I will be returning it!
customer_reviews.author: K. A.

customer_reviews.title: Look good girls!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this color & coupled with another as a liner, just beautiful & affectionate too. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: g. galbom

customer_reviews.title: Sheek
customer_reviews.text: Love the color, it's a nice beautiful nude. It's not sticky and it doesn't taste funny. Sometimes I add a hint of pink gloss and it takes it over the top. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The pink
customer_reviews.text: The super light pink is a bold color, and that's its saving grace. This is NOT a super stay mate lipstick, it comes off on everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The color of this lip stain  made my face look sharper and brighter
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this product by Jiaqi Li, a famous Chinese makeup specialist. His recommendations never disappoint me.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser275

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Great color, very lightweight, easy to apply, but it doesn’t last long.. In fact if I eat or drink something, I feel like it’s gone or has faded
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: The rarest of reds.
customer_reviews.text: Precious few reds don’t look outrageous on my lips but this one is perfect. And it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: nikki lorel

product_meta.title: L'Oreal Paris Makeup Rouge Signature Matte Lip Stain, I Rebel
product_meta.description:
Color:I RebelLess texture*, more color: Rouge Signature is a lightweight matte colored ink that delivers intense pigment loads with a weightless, bare-lip sensation. This ultra-comfortable liquid matte colored ink provides lasting matte color and infuses lips with a healthy, even dye of color. The no makeup feel of a stain combined with the color impact of a liquid lipstick. Find your signature shade from our captivating range. Use with our precision applicator to shape and lines lips for a precise and perfectly applied lip.
*Vs. Colour Riche Original Lipstick.
feature_bullets: Weightless Matte Lip Stain: Introducing Rouge Signature Matte Lip stain, the first lip stain from L’Oreal Paris that delivers the high color impact of a liquid lipstick with the no makeup feel of a lip stain
Lasting Lip Color: The unique precision applicator shapes and lines lips for a precise and perfectly applied lip. Find your shade from bold reds, to wearable nudes and pinks, to plums and purples
The Perfect Shade: We offer lipstick in every format: liquids, bullets and melty balms for maximum impact. With shades from bold reds to barely there nudes, find the perfect shade and format for you

All Things Beauty: Keep your beauty stash stocked with the best! We have a variety of products to help you achieve any look - whether you need eye makeup for a killer cat eye or face makeup for a flawless complexion
L'Oreal Innovation: As the biggest beauty brand in the world, we have an unparalleled commitment to combining the latest in technology with the highest in quality for the ultimate in luxury beauty
